title: BRIEF-Spirit Aerosystems Holdings Inc Says Spirit Does Not Buy Parts Or Services Directly From Manufacturing Process Specification Srl
text:
* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS SAYS UPON RECEIPT OF INFORMATION FROM BOEING IDENTIFYING PARTS FROM SUB-TIER SUPPLIERS WHICH USED MPS, SPIRIT TOOK APPROPRIATE ACTION

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS - SPIRIT WORKED WITH BOEING THROUGHOUT THE PROCESS AND HAS ONLY SHIPPED PARTS APPROVED BY BOEING THROUGHOUT THE PROCESS AND HAS ONLY SHIPPED PARTS APPROVED BY

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS - FROM MARCH-JULY 2021, BOEING COMMUNICATED TO SUPPLY CHAIN ABOUT POSSIBLE FLAWED PARTS, DATING BACK TO 2017 FROM MANUFACTURING PROCESS SPECIFICATION SRL Further company coverage:
